alert.note: Alert for Caddo; Canadian; Grady; McClain (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 01 at 1:03AM CDT until June 01 at 1:30AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 130 AM CDT FOR GRADY...EAST CENTRAL CADDO...SOUTHEASTERN CANADIAN AND NORTHWESTERN MCCLAIN COUNTIES... At 102 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 5 miles northeast of Lake Chickasha to 3 miles north of Tabler to near Alex, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Southwestern Oklahoma City, Chickasha, Newcastle, Blanchard, Mustang, Tuttle, Union City, Minco, Dibble, Washington, Cole, Alex, Verden, Amber, Bridge Creek, Pocasset, Norge, Agawam, Criner and Middleberg. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
